props.name: dir
props.description: The global reading direction of your application. This will be inherited by all primitives.

props.name: locale
props.description: The global locale of your application. This will be inherited by all primitives.

props.name: nonce
props.description: The global `nonce` value of your application. This will be inherited by the related primitives.

props.name: scrollBody
props.description: The global scroll body behavior of your application. This will be inherited by the related primitives.

props.name: useId
props.description: The global `useId` injection as a workaround for preventing hydration issue.

exposed.name: useId
exposed.description: The global `useId` injection as a workaround for preventing hydration issue.
